special_text:
[i]“Our city is already great. We need not the voices of heroes past to guide us to salvation.”[/i]
You may sacrifice another nonland permanent. When you do, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls that shares a type with the sacrificed permanent.
Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with mana value 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
Each opponent loses 3 life. You gain 3 life.
